title.narrative: Sri Lanka COVID-19 Emergency Response and Health Systems Preparedness Project

description.narrative: To prevent, detect and respond to the threat posed by COVID-19 and strengthen national systems for public health preparedness in Sri Lanka

title.narrative: Number of secondary and tertiary hospitals with solar energy backup to overcome electricity outages
Number of secondary and tertiary care hospitals with networked laboratory information system in place
Number of peer-reviewed publications from Research Institutions supported to undertake research and monitor progress and capacity of the health system for pandemic preparedness
Number of secondary and tertiary care hospitals with classified accredited labs
Number of individual isolation rooms established within the National Institute of Infectious Diseases established
Number of beneficiaries provided with cash transfers in response to COVID-19
Number of health staff trained in infection prevention and control per MoH approved protocols
Number of field staff engaged in elder care, homes for the people with special needs and orphanages trained and equipped for prevention and care measures
Number of secondary and tertiary care hospitals with environmental protection license (EPL) and Scheduled waste license (SWL)
Number of designated laboratories with COVID-19 diagnostic equipment, test kits, and reagents
Number of children and men utilizing gender-based violence services through the Mithuru Piyasas
Number of ICU beds in tertiary and secondary hospitals against planned
Number of sub-national emergency operational centers with an established quarantine mechanism
Percentage of health districts with a tertiary or secondary care hospital with isolation capacity
Number of women utilizing gender-based violence services through the Mithuru Piyasas
Number of individuals utilizing GBV services through the Mithuru Piyasas
National protocols for detection, surveillance, and response systems for animal and human health infections
Emergency Operations Centre for COVID-19 and pandemic responses established
Guidelines to engage private health facilities in supporting pandemic response
Percentage of population vaccinated, which is included in the priority population targets defined in the NDVP, disaggregated by gender
Number of districts with functional vaccination tracking system/HMIS collecting sex and age disaggregated data on COVID-19 vaccinesat district level
National Deployment and Vaccination Plan for COVID-19 vaccines with input from relevant bodies is updated by the government, as needed
Percentage of received grievances that are addressed within 30 days
